document_data.name: Wary Warrior
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wary Warrior''' was a weapon shop in the city of [[Arabel]].
document_data.Location: The store was located in the center of the city, on the north side{{Arabel map orientation}} of the [[High Road (Cormyr)|High Road]] before it intersected with the [[East Way]] and [[Calantar's Way]]. It was west of [[Szantel's Ropes, Cords, Chains, and Mesh]] and across the street from the shop of [[Dazniir Relharphin]], the wheelwright.
document_data.Services: The shop sold all manner of weapons.
